description: This file is an OpenAPI (Swagger) specification defining the REST API endpoints for the Secure Link Archive backend service, including URL shortening, archiving, redirection, comparison, and static assets.

methods.name: health_check__get
methods.description: API endpoint for health check to verify if the service is running

methods.name: create_short_link_api_urls_shorten_post
methods.description: API endpoint to create a shortened URL and archive its content

methods.name: redirect_with_header_r__code__get
methods.description: API endpoint to serve archived page content with a floating header, based on a short code

methods.name: compare_api_compare__code__get
methods.description: API endpoint to compare current content with archived content using a short code

methods.name: header_style_api_header_style_css_get
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve the CSS stylesheet for the floating header

methods.name: header_script_api_header_script_js_get
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve the JavaScript for the floating header
